mapper.insert: insert into ALBUMLIST ( ALBUM_NUM, ALBUM_WRITER, ALBUM_OPENRANGE, ALBUM_IDENTIFIER ) values ( ALBUMLIST_SEQ.nextval, #{album_writer}, #{album_openrange}, #{album_identifier} )
insert into Page ( PAGE_ID, ALBUM_NUM, PAGE_NUM, PAGE_HTML ) values ( PAGE_SEQ.nextval, #{album_num}, #{page_num}, #{page_html} )
mapper.select: select album_num from albumlist where ALBUM_IDENTIFIER = #{album_identifier}
select * from albumlist where album_writer like '%'||#{search}||'%' or album_name like '%'||#{search}||'%' or album_contents like '%'||#{search}||'%'
select * from page where album_num=#{number} and page_num=1
